subject: Re: Perl directory listing program
body:
On 6/12/07, Beginner  wrote:
snip
> perldoc -f format                       # For an alternative way to format some headers.
snip

I would suggest using Perl6::Form instead of the built-in format
handling.  The built-in format pretty much forces you to use bad
style.

* http://search.cpan.org/~dconway/Perl6-Form-0.04/Form.pm
